Title: Requires disclosure by crisis pregnancy centers
Summary: Requires disclosure by crisis pregnancy centers to clients that such center will not provide abortion or birth control services or make a referral for such services, and that such center is not a licensed medical provider; provides such notice shall be conducted upon first communication or first contact with the client and shall be either in a written statement or oral communication by staff assisting the client.
LawCode: Add ยง2509-d, Pub Health L
